channel.title: [Delta] Another problem ASAP Help needed! [Delta]

item.title: [Delta] Another problem ASAP Help needed! [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

I need help with my yell command. I put }else if{ and }if else{ and if 100 errors me…

client.java:8232: 'else' without 'if' }else{ ^ client.java:8236: 'else' without 'if' }else{ ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 8 && playerRights >= 0) {
String text = command.substring(8);
yell("[Regular]" + playerName +": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else{
if (playerRights == 1);
yell("@blu@[Mod]@bla@" + playerName +": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else{
if (playerRights == 2);
yell("@yel@[Admin]@bla@" + playerName +": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

		}else{
		if (playerRights == 3);
			yell("@red@[Owner]@bla@" + playerName +": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}[/code]

Read full topic
